body: Daz: I know, COA Is pretty much my favorite.. the story is so good but the updates are sooo slow. nonexistest even. So sad to see the industry being so hard on authors
I believe the correct term is "Pornhwa"

No wonder COA hasn't seen any updating in a while, the author is spending his time making this garbage. Just like the author that did Need a Girl is now doing Sweet Guy. So many Korean authors are now are making comics now with barely any good plot and just plain sex.
Well apparently having good art isn't enough to make people notice your work. Authors have to resort to making hentai to sell their stuff. Not that I'm complaining, more gud stuff better ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Yup, faromir i notice that too...
shiningnipples: ikr !? :0 cavalier of the abyss might also be even more accurate. the art is so similair
Is this the same guy who made immortal regis? great art and story
